content.rendered:
Rebecca Mckinlay

Capture Manager

Becky brings over 25+ years of experience, supporting the largest and most complex Department of Defense (DoD) data centers. She was responsible for maintaining the secure information processing requirements of the DoD, including critical command and control systems that supported the President, Combatant Commanders, and National Level leadership. Additionally, she oversaw mission-critical logistics, financial, and personnel readiness systems supporting DoD Services.

Contact Me
